qas.question: The Delhi Flying Club was established in what year?
When established in 1928, which airport served as the base of the Delhi Flying Club?
In what year did the government close Safdarjung Airport due to security concerns?
In what year did the Delhi Flying club begin operations?
What type of aircraft was first used by the Delhi Flying Club after its founding?

context: The Delhi Flying Club, established in <a0_0>1928<a0_0/> with two <a4_0>de Havilland Moth aircraft<a4_0/> named Delhi and Roshanara, was based at <a1_0>Safdarjung Airport<a1_0/> which started operations in <a3_0>1929<a3_0/>, when it was the Delhi's only airport and the second in India. The airport functioned until 2001, however in January <a2_0>2002<a2_0/> the government closed the airport for flying activities because of security concerns following the New York attacks in September 2001. Since then, the club only carries out aircraft maintenance courses, and is used for helicopter rides to Indira Gandhi International Airport for VIP including the president and the prime minister.
